question:
①At the beginning of the video, the cameraman is walking on a step.
②In front and to the left of the cameraman, a man without a hat is also on the step.
③This man's gaze falls upon two natural landscapes, one large and one small.
④Assume you are directly beneath the large natural landscape, facing an orange teppanyaki sign. In what direction is the small landscape located relative to you?

①In the video, find an arcade on the street and remember the main color of its sign (Color A).
②Then, go back to the shot of the city square filmed from a high angle, where a sign with Color A as its background appears. Above this sign is another black sign with a doll on it.
What is the skin color of this doll?

①Locate a man who is wearing a white shirt and a black backpack.
②He is walking on a pedestrian street.
③When he first appears in the video, he is in a hurry to get to the opposite side of the street.
The shop he walks out of has a sign with a main color A. Later, when the camera pans to the pedestrian street, a man is holding a plastic bag of color A. What is the color of the shirt worn by the person closest to him?

①In the video, a large bridge appears.
②On one side of this bridge is an arcade game shop. Now, locate a sporting goods store on the other side of the bridge.
③On the side of the building where this sporting goods store is located, there is a green advertisement.
④Opposite this advertisement is a shopping mall. Please search online, what was the opening year of this mall?

①Locate a large display screen on the street that first shows a cartoon character and then a realistic video.
②Below this screen is a billboard full of anime characters.
③To the left of this billboard is a brightly colored promotional sign, with color B.
④There is a man nearby whose entire outfit is also color B. Locate this man.
⑤This man turns and stops at almost the same time as a woman.
⑥This woman is carrying a large bag. What is the color of this bag?

①In the arcade scene at the beginning of the video, find a claw machine that meets all the following conditions:
②It is part of a unit stacked with two layers of machines; it is on the upper layer.
③From the video's perspective, it is the machine on the far right.
④All adjacent machines are white.
If the protagonist stands directly in front of the side of this claw machine with the controls, facing it, in what direction is the dark black coin exchange machine located relative to the protagonist?

①In the arcade, find a man wearing a white T-shirt and a black crossbody bag.
②At the moment he is about to disappear from the frame, assume he maintains his current orientation and position, and then turns to his left.
③In what direction would the claw machine full of colorful handheld fans be located relative to him?

①First, find a circular logo on a building featuring a small animal.
②Assume the color of this animal's mouth is color 'a'.
③Later in the walk, a shop appears with a row of colorful small signs under its main sign. The color 'a' is on the far left.
④Counting from the left, the main color of the 2nd sign is most similar to which other sign's color?

①In the pedestrian street scene, find a male pedestrian who is wearing a short-sleeved T-shirt.
②He has a black shoulder bag on his left shoulder.
③As he walks from the right to the left of the screen, his front is momentarily completely blocked by a woman in a light-colored top.
④This woman then passes by a boy with yellow hair. What color is the yellow-haired boy's bag?

①First, find a shop themed around a symbolic Chinese creature.
②At the crossroads at the end of the video, find the glasses shop with a red logo on the corner.
③Now, plan the shortest walking path in your mind from the center of the 'dragon' entrance to the glasses shop's door. When you reach the beginning of the crosswalk on this virtual path, the crosswalk is directly in front of you. In what direction is another shop with a solid red sign (not the Ray-Ban glasses shop) located relative to you?

①At the beginning of the video, on the right side, there is a prominent vertical sign telling customers what businesses are on each floor. Let's define a 'y-color x-streak' as x consecutive signs of color y.
②Viewed vertically, the maximum streak on this sign is recorded as n.
How many different colors achieve this maximum streak n?

①Find a unique traffic light in the video that meets all the following conditions:
②It is located at a street corner.
③Directly below it (vertically) is a white and green pedestrian crossing light.
④The traffic light has two pedestrian indicator lights attached to it.
From the camera's angle, what is the color of the wall behind the traffic light?

①While passing through the pedestrian street, many cars are parked on the roadside. Locate a car 'a' that meets the following conditions:
②Car 'a' does not have its hazard lights on (the lights are not flashing).
③The first digit of its license plate is not 6.
Now, look at the car 'b' in front of car 'a'. The sign of the shop closest to car 'b' features a common household item. What is it?

①Find a male pedestrian who has all the following features:
②He is crossing at a crosswalk.
③He is wearing a baseball cap.
④The person closest to him is wearing a crossbody bag.
How many people are crossing the crosswalk in a group with him?

①Find a woman with blonde hair.
②The man next to her is carrying a shoulder bag and wearing white shorts. Let's call the man 'b'.
③When 'b' is in the center of the screen, he is looking at a shop 'x'.
Locate the streetlight closest to this shop. What is at the base of this streetlight?

①In the video, as the camera follows a man with a black backpack and striped shirt walking on the sidewalk, he passes two red-and-white shops.
②Between these two shops, there are two other shops, and a man walks out of one of them.
What is the color of the item this man is holding in his left hand?

①Several people with umbrellas appear in the video. Locate a woman with an umbrella who is wearing shorts, and her umbrella has a white background with a black pattern.
②To her front-left, there is another person 'b' with an umbrella (on the same side of the road).
③Across the street from person 'b' is a man facing them, and he is carrying a crossbody bag.
What color is this man's shirt?

①In the video, as the camera films from behind a group of pedestrians waiting to cross the street, a blue and white striped 'MIZUHO' bank building is visible across the road.
②In this group of pedestrians, there is a person with a distinctive hair color, and their bag is the same color as their hair.
③If you were this person, facing the direction they are facing, what color is the bag of the man with headphones behind you?

①In the video, a white taxi is waiting at a traffic light.
②Directly in front of it is a black SUV.
③When the light turns green and both vehicles start moving, a man in the crowd scratches his neck after the SUV passes through the people.
What is the color of this man's shirt?

①In the video, first locate the store with a giant glass cube entrance.
②On the street next to this glass cube, there are two food trucks of the same color.
③When passing the food truck closer to the glass cube, an SUV of the same color as the food truck appears on the right-hand side of the road.
④What is the color of the vest of the cyclist passing by this SUV at this moment?

Please find a moment in the video that satisfies all the following conditions:
①There is a white food truck on the street.
②At least two American flags are hanging on a distant building.
③A mother pushing a stroller has just disappeared from the frame.
At this moment, there are many people in the frame. Focus on a man wearing a hat and standing still in this crowd.
What is the color of the shirt of the man also standing still to his right?

①Find the bald man with a backpack walking on the steps next to the glass cube entrance.
②In the frame, there is a woman with the same skin tone as him, taking care of a child.
③In what direction is this woman located relative to a seated man wearing a blue hat (from the perspective of the man in the hat)?

①Find the beige building A with many flags in the video.
②Then find an area B enclosed by a low red and white barrier.
③Consider the two flags on building A that are closest to area B; they form a line l1.
④Consider the line l2 extended from the windowsills of the row of windows on building A facing area B.
What is the approximate acute angle between line l1 and line l2?

Please find a car in the video that satisfies all the following conditions:
①It is behind a group of yellow cars.
②It is in the lane to the right of the lane with a left-turning car.
③It is not yellow.
④There is a car of the same color directly in front of it.
⑤It is in front of the left-turning car.
What is the color of this car?

The scene shows many buildings with American flags. Now, identify building A:
①Its flags are higher than any other flags in the frame.
②All of its visible flags are at the same height.
Next, locate building B: it is surrounded by red posters and has a small green door in the middle.
Imagine a person standing at the entrance of B, facing the street. In what direction would building A be located relative to this person?

①Find a shop window filled with yellow lights, displaying various musical instruments.
②As the camera pans right from this window until the American flag across the street first appears clearly,
③Position yourself at the hanging point of that flag, facing the yellow-lit window.
In what direction is the distant, church-like spire building located relative to you?

①Locate the Louis Vuitton window display featuring three pink flamingo models.
②In the window directly behind these flamingos, there is a mannequin wearing sunglasses and a black outfit.
③What is the English word written above this mannequin's head?

①Find a blue bus with the number 326 on one corner of its front.
②The color of the wall of the fashion store to the bus driver's right is A.
③There is a flag to the bus driver's left whose color is also close to A.
④What is the color of the billboard below this flag?

①In the BERGDORF GOODMAN store window at the beginning of the video, there is a mannequin in a yellow suit next to a silver barber chair.
②Now, imagine you are sitting in this chair, and there is a tree to your front-left.
③If you are now standing under the tree, facing the distant, church-like spire building.
④In what direction is the silver barber chair located relative to you?

At an intersection, find a car that meets all the following conditions:
①It is a white car.
②It is moving from the right side of the screen to the left.
③From the white car driver's perspective, there is a black car directly in front of it.
What is the color of the car directly behind this white car?

①First, find the American flag next to the green flag hanging on the exterior wall of the 'Tiffany & Co.' building.
②Then, later in the video at an intersection, find a woman wearing a green plaid top and a black backpack.
③At the moment this woman has one foot on the edge of the crosswalk line and the other foot has not yet stepped onto the crosswalk.
④From the woman's perspective, in what direction is the American flag?

On the crosswalk, find a pedestrian who meets all the following criteria:
①Is a man.
②Is wearing a light-colored short-sleeved shirt.
③Is wearing glasses.
④Is holding something in his left hand.
Assuming you are this man, there is a man with a shoulder bag to your front-right. What is the color of this man's shirt?

①Find the large clock next to the golden 'TRUMP TOWER'.
②Observe the spire of the church-like building behind the clock (from the video's perspective).
③Imagine you are standing next to the clock, facing the church spire.
④The interior theme color of the building to your front-left is A.
⑤Next to this building, there is a man whose shirt is also color A.
What color are this man's pants?

Please find a moment in the video that satisfies all the following conditions:
①A young man in a dark blue Polo shirt is leaning against a traffic light pole, looking at his phone.
②A woman in a black top and denim shorts walks past him.
③As the man is about to disappear from the frame, there is a man in a black shirt and black shorts to his front-right.
What is this man's hair color?

①Find the rainbow-colored bus with 'World Pride' printed on its side as it drives by.
②Then, later in the video, find a police officer resting by the roadside.
③And this officer is standing next to a street clock.
④Imagine you are standing where the officer is, facing the direction in which the rainbow bus disappeared.
What is the name of the store to your front-right?

①First, find a male employee pushing a cart with a white box on it.
②He is standing directly in front of a building's golden entrance.
③Remember this building as A.
④Later, as the camera moves along the sidewalk, find a flag composed of white, red, and blue (not the American flag).
⑤Imagine you are standing under this flag, facing the nearest American flag.
In what direction is the entrance of building A located relative to you?

①In the video, find the 'Gucci' store window.
②On the left side of its window, there is a female mannequin. Remember her as x.
③The camera continues forward, and after passing this store, the 'ARMANI / 5th AVENUE' sign appears.
④After that, a FedEx vehicle appears.
Imagine you are the driver of this vehicle. Which of the following would be on the line connecting you and x?
answer_choice_4: A person on the phone holding a bicycle

question: ①Find a building that meets all of the following conditions: its overall shape is curved or circular; ②it is located by the street; ③at the beginning of the video, many people walk towards it after the traffic light turns green. Now, imagine you are standing in the very center of the roof of this building, facing the silver building with 'citadines' written on it and green vegetation on the top floor. At this point, what English letters are written on the building to your front-right?

①In the video, lock onto a red car that has a pink car appear to its left. ②Then, lock onto a moment when a white bus with the license plate ending in 45J appears on the far right of the screen. At this time, the red car overlaps with the bottom of a building A on the screen. Remember building A. ③Later in the video, when a bus numbered 167 is waiting at a red light, the front of this bus is facing building B. If you are standing under the most prominent English sign of building B, facing the bus, in what direction is building A located relative to you?

Lock onto a person walking in the crowd on the street who meets the following criteria: ①they are wearing a white top; ②they are wearing black pants; ③they are carrying a cross-body bag; ④there is another person in front of them who also meets these conditions. What color is the bag on this person's right shoulder?

①The video shows many bright blue cars. Lock onto the first blue car that appears in the frame. ②Note the color of the car to its left as it crosses the yellow line (Color A). ③Subsequently, find a man in the video wearing a shirt of the exact same Color A, crossing the street with a cross-body bag on his right shoulder. What color is the shirt of the man to his front-left?

①In the scene where people are waiting for the traffic light, lock onto a woman wearing a white dress with red spots who is looking at her phone. ②Near her is a man whose pants are the same color as the woman's headphones. This man is holding a bag in his left hand. ③After the light turns green at the intersection where this man is waiting, one person on the opposite side walks the fastest, ahead of all other pedestrians. What color is this person's shirt?

①When a silver SUV is stopped in the leftmost lane, a car to its right stops in the rightmost lane. ②The color of this car on the right is A. ③At the same time, a large truck of the same color A has also appeared in the video, in the leftmost lane. What is the color of the car behind this large truck?

①Find a bakery named 'PAWA BAKERY' and remember the color of the letters on its sign (Color A). ②In a subsequent scene, lock onto a man whose shirt is also Color A, who is not wearing glasses, is wearing blue jeans, and is walking alongside a person in white clothes for a while. ③During his walk in the video, this man encounters an unusually tall man. Next to this tall man is a woman wearing a dress. What color is the tall man's shirt?

①In the road scene of the video, please find a vehicle that meets all the following conditions: it is a red car; it is closer to a bright blue car in the middle of the road than another red car. ②This red car passes a building with an all-glass facade. ③There is a directional sign at the bottom of this building. What is the color of the area at the very bottom of the sign, which is different from the sign's background color?

①In the video, find a restaurant with a blue circular sign that says 'DISTRIKT'. ②A man dressed rather formally walks past this shop. ③Directly behind this man is a woman with a cross-body bag, A. ④This woman A has walked past a person leaning against a wall, wearing a dress, and looking at their phone. What is the color of the dress-wearing woman's handbag?

①Lock onto a roadside marker; this small marker is silver, highly reflective, and has a sphere at its base. ②Near this marker is a woman leaning against a wall, wearing a dress, and looking at her phone. ③In front of this woman is a very conspicuous street-side object (not the silver one). What is the color of this object?

In the video, ① there is a group of people gathered and discussing something, surrounded by green natural scenery. ② The gazes of these people are mostly directed in the same direction. Assume this group is at location A. Now, lock onto a person sitting in front of a store. ① This person is wearing a dark top and facing the street. ② They are talking but there is no one else around them. If this person were to sit in the seat opposite their table and look straight ahead, in what direction would location A be relative to them?

①A red double-decker tourist bus is traveling on the road. ②Before it completely exits the frame, from the bus driver's perspective, another white minibus appears from the rear-right of the bus and gradually overtakes it. ③When the front of the white minibus aligns with the rear of the double-decker bus, what is the position of the only blue car in the frame relative to this white minibus?

①A green glass curtain wall building with a red 'NTUC' sign on top is clearly visible in the frame; ②In front of this building is a place A composed of multiple colors such as red, yellow, blue, and green; ③Near place A is a notice board composed of yellow, blue, and white, designated as place B. Assuming you are standing at place B facing place A, in what direction is the sign marked 'D'almeida St' located relative to you?

①First, find the man in the light blue Polo shirt and blue jeans walking out from the escalator area. ②When he is still on the escalator, there is another person A behind him. ③Behind person A is another person, and their shirts are the same color. What color are the pants of the man behind A?

①As the cameraman descends on an escalator, there is an ascending escalator on the right and fixed stairs on the left. ②Please focus on the moving targets: a man in a white shirt passing on the ascending escalator on the right, and a woman whose lower body is visible downstairs. ③When the woman first steps on the red line in the video, assume that she and the man in the white shirt form a straight line l1. ④What is the approximate acute angle between this line l1 and the red line on the floor?

①When the camera reaches the bottom of the escalator, a yellow 'Exit E' sign appears on the wall directly in front. Please remember this location. ②The camera then continues through the underpass until many advertisements appear on the left wall. Among them, on the left, is a blue 'MAKE A RAIL IMPACT' advertisement. ③If you are now standing in front of the blue advertisement, facing it, and then turn 180 degrees, in what direction is the yellow sign located relative to you?

①In the circular hall at the end of the video, there are multiple yellow exit signs on the wall (including 'Exit I' and 'Exit E'). ②When the camera is directly facing the midpoint between the 'Exit I' and 'Exit F' signs, a directional arrow can be seen between two areas covered in green light. ③Assume you are now in front of this arrow, facing in the direction it points. ④Previously, a blue 'MAKE A RAIL IMPACT' advertisement appeared on the wall. Where is this advertisement located relative to you now?

①In the video, first find a man in a solid purple shirt talking on the phone on an escalator. ②Note which hand (left or right) he uses for the phone call. ③Later, at the subway station entrance, a person can be seen carrying a cross-body bag on the same shoulder, and next to them are two other people carrying cross-body bags on the opposite shoulder. Lock onto the person carrying the bag on the same side. What color is the bag on this person's shoulder?

①In the video, a purple and white SBS Transit bus is pulling into a stop. ②If you are the driver of this bus, there is a group of people to your front-right. Lock onto person A in this group who is wearing blue. This person is holding something with one hand. ③Lock onto a man near him who is holding clothes with the same arm. ④What is the color of the sign directly behind this man?

①In the video, find a small white electric car (with the word 'BlueSG' on its side) stopped in front of a crosswalk. ②At the same time, there is a green road sign that says 'Robinson Rd'. ③If the white electric car were to travel along the shortest path to be directly underneath this green road sign, without changing its final orientation, what color would the sign directly to the driver's right be?

①In the video, near the entrance of 'Tottenham Court Road Station', locate an area between two people in blue clothes.
②In this area, a person in a black top and long pants appears, carrying a bag and looking straight ahead while walking.
③A person in a pink top appears behind this person. What color are the pants of the person in pink?

①Find the giant electronic screen playing a forest animation in the video.
②On the steps to the left of the screen stands a small green creature with a leaf on its head, let's call it A.
③In the real world, a tall man B, wearing a black vest, white pants, and a backpack, is standing in front of the screen watching.
④From the video's perspective, a man C with brown hair and headphones is right next to a sign that says 'CAUTION'.
If A and B form a line l1, and B and C form a line l2, what is the approximate acute angle between l1 and l2?

①In the scene of crossing the road, lock on the moment the traffic light countdown shows.
②At this moment, identify a boy A in a black top and shorts, whose shoes have more than one color.
③Then, identify a girl B who is wearing a black top, and the person next to her is not wearing white shoes.
At that moment, which store does the line formed by A and B pass through?

①Locate a red bus with the brand 'Voyage' on its side.
②As this bus is moving, there is a girl with blonde hair and black clothes to the bus driver's left.
③In front of this girl, there is a person carrying a blue bag. Remember the color of the top worn by the woman next to this man is color A.
④There is also a girl with A-colored hair in front of the blonde girl.
What color is this girl's top?

①In the video, lock on a red building next to a golden building, and the ground floor of this red building has a shop with green decorations.
②If you are standing next to this green-decorated shop, facing an orange and green billboard across the street.
In what direction is the Starbucks store located relative to you?

①Find a red English telephone box in the video.
②Observe a man in a blue-green top and shorts, not wearing glasses, walking on the pavement next to it.
③When his head aligns with the '20' speed limit signpost, there is a person in front of him and to his right.
What color are this person's shoes?

①Find a building with a semi-circular black screen with red text in the video.
②Then, find a pedicab with a pinkish-purple canopy on the street.
③Assuming this pedicab passes by the theater entrance and continues to the next intersection before turning left.
What is the color of the building at the end of the road directly ahead?

①Lock on a person in white clothes holding a large suitcase. The color of the suitcase is A.
②Then, lock on a bus where the main color of a design on its side is also A.
③This bus has both a license plate number and a number above the front, both containing digits.
How many common digits are there between these two numbers?

①Find a building on the street with a sign that includes 'skin cupid'. The main color of this shop is X.
②Near this building, there is a person whose hat is also color X. At the moment this person crosses the street and just steps onto the pavement.
If this person were to turn around, what would be the background color of the building to their front-left?

①Lock on two boys in red clothes. As they walk past a roadside sign with a speed limit, there is a group of people behind them.
②Identify a person in this group who is wearing a light-colored top, holding something in his right hand, has brownish hair, and the top is a cool color.
③Next to this person is a man holding a white bag.
What color is the top of the man holding the bag?

①Lock on a street-side shop with a red sign that says 'Cafeteria'.
②At this moment, focus on a man in the frame wearing black shorts and a crossbody bag. Let's say the color of this man's top is X.
③Later, there is another shop on the street. The exterior of the shop is mostly black, but part of the window display is color X, and it's very exquisitely decorated.
What is the background color of the sign pointing towards this shop?

①Lock on a large bus with a red background advertisement on its side.
②Focus on a group of people walking past it, one of whom is wearing a solid black top and a crossbody bag.
③A person in a hurry, almost running in the street, passes by this man's left side.
What color is the top of the person who is in a hurry?

①In the video, find a red English telephone box under a tree.
②Assume you are standing next to this telephone box, facing a pedicab waiting for passengers.
③To your direct left is a building, Building C.
④Later, at the crossroads at the end of the video, there is another large building with a curved wall, with the sunset hitting its upper part. Let's call this Building A.
If you are standing at the entrance of Building C, facing Building A, in what direction is a solid blue booth that appears in the video located relative to you?

Please find a scene in the video that simultaneously meets the following conditions:
①There are two red double-decker buses in the background.
②Several people are gathered and chatting; they belong to an ethnicity known for celebrating Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha.
Identify a woman in this group who is wearing her bag across her chest.
Directly behind this woman, there are two seated men. What color is the top of the man closer to her?

①Please locate the theater with the 'Harry Potter and the Cursed Child' sign in the video.
②At the entrance of the theater, find a woman pushing a stroller (Woman A). The color of her top is A.
③Around this woman, many people are seen with crossbody bags. Among them, identify a person who is not facing the camera, whose shoes are white + a dark color, and whose bag is not color A.
What is the main color of their top?

①Find the pub named 'Coach & Horses' in the video.
②Many people are standing below this pub. Identify one person who meets these criteria: they are wearing shorts; a person in brown pants passes them sooner than any other qualifying person.
③The man closest to this person is wearing long pants.
What is the man in long pants holding in his left hand?

①At the end of the video, there is a 'Noodle Inn' with many red lanterns hanging.
②In the queue outside, find the only woman who meets all the following conditions: she is wearing a light-colored sleeveless top; her shoes are also light-colored; both she and the man next to her are wearing hats.
③Behind this woman, there is a person A whose top and pants are the same color as the hatted woman's pants.
What color is the top of the man next to person A?

Identify several shops:
A: The Spice of Life
B: The Cambridge
C: Harry Potter Theatre
If you are standing at the entrance of C, facing shop A, in what direction is shop B located relative to you?

①In the video, first locate the restaurant with the round, glowing green sign.
②As the camera passes this restaurant, notice a piece of graffiti on the wall across the street that includes a woman whose top is color A.
③Around this restaurant, there is a person whose sleeve is also color A.
④When this person turns their head to one side, a person is walking inside the restaurant directly in their line of sight.
What color is the walking person's top?

①Find a shop named 'O'Mantra' in the video, which has a dark green exterior.
②Opposite this shop is a trash can of color A.
③On the street, locate a man wearing a formal suit of color A, who is accompanied by a woman in a skirt.
④Identify the nearest street-side shop to this woman in the skirt.
What is the main interior color of this shop?

Find a moment in the video that satisfies all the following conditions:
①At the end of the street, there is a large billboard predominantly in blue and purple.
②A white van is parked on the right side of the frame.
As the cameraman walks to the front of the van, a man crosses the nearby crosswalk.
This man then passes a couple. What is the man in the couple holding?

①Locate a street where the taxis have green lights on their roofs.
②On this street, a woman is yawning in the frame.
③In this woman's line of sight, there is another woman, Woman A, carrying a large white bag.
